it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.ip6.exthdr

Class ExtensionHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.ip6.exthdr.ExtensionHeader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FragmentHeader, OptionsHeader, RoutingHeader

    public class ExtensionHeader
extends java.lang.Object
    A generic IPv6 extension header.
